players.name: Alice
memory: Bob: "I find it strange that Charlie was the one who was found dead last night. Let's be vigilant and make sure we all work together to figure out what happened."
Diana: "I agree with Bob, we need to be vigilant and work together. Let's focus on finding out who could have possibly harmed Charlie."

Bob: "I believe it's important that we all share any information we may have, no matter how insignificant it might seem. I remember Charlie mentioning something about a secret meeting with the mafia last night before he was found dead. We should investigate this lead further."

You: "I'm not sure if Charlie's mention of a secret meeting was real or just something he made up. However, I think it's worth investigating further to see if there are any connections between the mafia and our village."
